subject: Cactus or J2EEUnit testing with Quartz
msgSnippet: Hello all I am in the beginning of a project and we will use Quartz to schedule our Jobs I will be the tester of the group and I ll probably going to use
messageBody:
Hello all
I am in the beginning of a project and we will use Quartz to schedule
our Jobs
I will be the tester of the group and I'll probably going to use
Cactus
But I can't find any material on the web (from what I tried to find
in Google ... ) about testing a Quartz Jobs with JUnit and Cactus.
Did anybody here had any experience with Quartz?
Any Tip you have for me will be great; I am a complete noob in JUnit
testing.
Thanks in advance
Tal
